suncertify
Class URLyBirdRecordModificationPolicy

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.URLyBirdRecordModificationPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, RecordModificationPolicy
public final class URLyBirdRecordModificationPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordModificationPolicy

Determines whether a given record is modifiable according to the URLyBird business rules. A record is modifiable if it has at least one modifiable field and the date field (if any) falls within the range specified in the properties file.

See Also:
